cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -DEXPAT_ATTR_INFO=OFF -DEXPAT_BUILD_DOCS=OFF -DEXPAT_BUILD_EXAMPLES=OFF -DEXPAT_BUILD_FUZZERS=OFF -DEXPAT_BUILD_PKGCONFIG=OFF -DEXPAT_BUILD_TESTS=OFF -DEXPAT_BUILD_TOOLS=OFF -DEXPAT_CHAR_TYPE=char -DEXPAT_CONTEXT_BYTES=1024 -DEXPAT_DEV_URANDOM=OFF -DEXPAT_DTD=ON -DEXPAT_ENABLE_INSTALL=OFF -DEXPAT_LARGE_SIZE=OFF -DEXPAT_MIN_SIZE=OFF -DEXPAT_NS=ON -DEXPAT_OSSFUZZ_BUILD=OFF -DEXPAT_SHARED_LIBS=OFF -DEXPAT_WARNINGS_AS_ERRORS=OFF -DEXPAT_WITH_GETRANDOM=OFF -DEXPAT_WITH_LIBBSD=OFF -DEXPAT_WITH_SYS_GETRANDOM=OFF ..
